xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Calendar Translations
xwikidoc.content:
xwiki.calendar.monthNames=['January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July', 'August', 'September', 'October', 'November', 'December'] xwiki.calendar.monthNamesShort=['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec'] xwiki.calendar.dayNames=['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday'] xwiki.calendar.dayNamesShort=['Sun', 'Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat']
xwiki.calendar.columnFormat.month=ddd xwiki.calendar.columnFormat.week=ddd M/D xwiki.calendar.columnFormat.day=dddd M/D
xwiki.calendar.event.description=Description: xwiki.calendar.event.location=Location: xwiki.calendar.event.status=Status:
xwiki.calendar.titleFormat.month=MMMM YYYY xwiki.calendar.titleFormat.week=MMM D YYYY xwiki.calendar.titleFormat.day=dddd, MMM D, YYYY
xwiki.calendar.timeFormat=h(:mm)t xwiki.calendar.axisFormat=h(:mm)t
xwiki.calendar.allDayText=All day xwiki.calendar.button.today=today xwiki.calendar.button.day=day xwiki.calendar.button.week=week xwiki.calendar.button.month=month
xwiki.calendar.notification.inprogress=Saving... xwiki.calendar.notification.done=Saved xwiki.calendar.notification.error=Failed to save the document. Reason: update failed! xwiki.calendar.notification.loading=Loading calendar... xwiki.calendar.notification.loaded=Calendar loaded
xwiki.calendar.jsonservice.invalid=Field not allowed or invalid.
rendering.macro.calendar.name=Calendar rendering.macro.calendar.description=Displays a Calendar rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.gApiKey.name=gApiKey rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.gApiKey.description=Key for the Google Calendar API. rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.gCal.name=gCal rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.gCal.description=Google calendar IDs separated by commas. rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.json.name=JSON rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.json.description=URL to a page generating JSON. This is only needed if the JSON generated by the Calendar.JSONService does not fit your needs. rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.updateurl.name=Update URL rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.updateurl.description=URL page to update events when they are moved or resized in the Calendar. The 'editable' parameter needs to be set to true for this field to be used. rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.classname.name=Classname rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.classname.description=Classname where the event objects are stored. The parameter is necessary unless a JSON service and and Update URL are provided rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.startfield.name=Start Field rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.startfield.description=Field in the object where the start date of the events are stored. The field needs to be a date field. The parameter is necessary unless a JSON service and and Update URL are provided rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.durationfield.name=Duration Field rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.durationfield.description=Field in the object where the duration of the events are stored. The field needs to be a date field. The parameter is necessary unless a JSON service and and Update URL are provided rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.editable.name=Editable rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.editable.description=Used to activate the edit feature allowing to move events rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.defaultView.name=Default View rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.defaultView.description=Default agenda to show on load of the agenda. Possible values are: month, agendaWeek, agendaDay, basicWeek, basicDay rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.year.name=Year rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.year.description=Year of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.month.name=Month rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.month.description=Month (from 0 to 11) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.date.name=Day rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.date.description=Day (from 1 to 31) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.firstDay.name=First Day rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.firstDay.description=First day (from 0 being Sunday to 6 being Monday) of the week to show in the calendar. Leave empty for Monday rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.firstHour.name=First Hour rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.firstHour.description=First hour to show in the calendar. Leave empty for default rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.minTime.name=Min Time rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.minTime.description=First time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours before this time. Leave empty for default (8.00) rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.maxTime.name=Max Time rendering.macro.calendar.parameter.maxTime.description=Last time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours after this time. Leave empty for default (23.00)
